nodes.text: Orthostatic hypotensive syncope of idiopathic origin

The orthostatic hypotensive syncope of idiopathic origin was the name given by the Drongar xenobiotic Ree Ohr to an unusual malady that struck clone trooper CT-914 during the Battle of Drongar. The condition was characterized by a very low blood pressure, causing the clone trooper to faint each time he tried to stand. Jedi Padawan Barriss Offee later discovered that the condition was caused by a damage to the trooper's hypothalamus and cured it with the Force.
